signupBonusDesc: Earn 75,000 bonus miles once you spend $4,000 on purchases within the first 3 months from account opening
trustedTraveler: Receive up to a $100 credit for Global Entry or TSA PreCheck
loungeAccess: Capital One Lounges - Escape the airport crowd by visiting our all-inclusive Lounges—enjoy unlimited complimentary access for you and 2 guests per visit. Partner Lounge Network - Enjoy unlimited access for you and 2 guests to 1,300+ lounges worldwide from Priority Pass™ and Plaza Premium Group.

benefit.benefitDesc: Receive an annual $300 credit for bookings through Capital One Travel.
Get 10,000 bonus miles (equal to $100 towards travel) every year, starting on your first anniversary.
Get reimbursed for damage or theft when you pay for a rental car with the Venture X card.
Cardholders enjoy access to exclusive reservations at award-winning restaurants and tickets to unforgettable culinary experiences.
Cardholders can experience events across, music, sports and dining with exclusive access to pre-sales, tickets and more.
Escape the airport crowd by visiting our all-inclusive Lounges—enjoy unlimited complimentary access for you and 2 guests per visit.
Protect your cell phone every time you pay your bill with your Venture X card. If it’s stolen or damaged, you’ll get reimbursed up to $800.
Unlock the world of art. Get access to over 60 of the world’s best museums with a 6-month complimentary Enthusiast membership to The Cultivist (a $220 value).
Access extraordinary travel experiences, destination guides and more with a complimentary PRIOR Subscription (a $149 value).

benefit.benefitTitle: Global Entry or TSA PreCheck® Credit
benefit.benefitDesc: Receive up to a $100 credit for Global Entry or TSA PreCheck®.
Skip the rental counter and enjoy the widest selection of cars with a complimentary upgrade.
Unlock premium benefits with every stay, like a $50 experience credit, room upgrades when available and more. Plus, earn 10X miles on hotel stays booked through Capital One Travel.
Use your Venture X miles to easily cover travel expenses, including flights, hotels, rental cars and more—plus transfer miles to your choice of 15+ travel loyalty programs.
Enjoy unlimited access for you and 2 guests to 1,300+ lounges worldwide from Priority Pass™ and Plaza Premium Group.
Enjoy a $100 experience credit, daily breakfast for 2 and other premium benefits, plus earn 10X miles on hotel stays booked through Capital One Travel.
